thread.title: Mark Randall

author: Mark Randall
title: Mark Randall
text:
Couldn't have asked for better customer service. I found myself without a locking wheel nut and when the local Ford dealership wanted to charge Â£100 to strip them all, Nick, the technician the company sent, got on the phone with them and convinced them to use their master keys... a trip to the dealership 90 minutes later to have the nuts whipped off, and back home, just in time for the van to turn back up and complete the job.
Top notch.
